content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://scbpocdev.dfs.core.windows.net/tpcdata', 
	)
Go
 
CREATE View call_center as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/call_center/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View catalog_page as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/catalog_page/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View catalog_returns as select *, cr.filepath(1) as cr_returned_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/catalog_returns/cr_returned_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View catalog_sales as select *, cr.filepath(1) as cs_sold_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/catalog_sales/cs_sold_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View customer as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/customer/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View customer_address as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/customer_address/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View customer_demographics as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/customer_demographics/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View date_dim as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/date_dim/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View household_demographics as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/household_demographics/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View income_band as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/income_band/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View inventory as select *, cr.filepath(1) as inv_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/inventory/inv_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View item as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/item/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View promotion as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/promotion/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View reason as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/reason/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View ship_mode as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/ship_mode/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View store as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/store/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View store_returns as select *, cr.filepath(1) as sr_returned_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/store_returns/sr_returned_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View store_sales as select *, cr.filepath(1) as ss_sold_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/store_sales/ss_sold_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View time_dim as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/time_dim/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View warehouse as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/warehouse/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View web_page as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/web_page/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO
CREATE View web_returns as select *, cr.filepath(1) as wr_returned_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/web_returns/wr_returned_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View web_sales as select *, cr.filepath(1) as ws_sold_date_sk from  OPENROWSET ( BULK 'tpcds/web_sales/ws_sold_date_sk=*/*.parquet', DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net', FORMAT = 'PARQUET' ) as cr
GO
CREATE View web_site as select * from OPENROWSET (BULK 'tpcds/web_site/*.parquet',DATA_SOURCE = 'tpcdata_scbpocdev_dfs_core_windows_net',FORMAT = 'PARQUET') as cr
GO


select count(*) from call_center
select count(*) from catalog_page
select count(*) from catalog_returns
select count(*) from catalog_sales
select count(*) from customer
select count(*) from customer_address
select count(*) from customer_demographics
select count(*) from date_dim
select count(*) from household_demographics
select count(*) from income_band
select count(*) from inventory
select count(*) from item
select count(*) from promotion
select count(*) from reason
select count(*) from ship_mode
select count(*) from store
select count(*) from store_returns
select count(*) from store_sales
select count(*) from time_dim
select count(*) from warehouse
select count(*) from web_page
select count(*) from web_returns
select count(*) from web_sales
select count(*) from web_site
